item.description:
Meet us on Marathon Day Weekend (Sunday, April 17th from 7a - 4p and Monday, April 18th from 7a - 2p) for our second Pet-Themed Yard Sale Fundraiser! 

We will be collecting items - from toasters to books to dvds to furniture to crates! - up until Saturday April 16th.  Items can be dropped off or mailed to NEBBC, 182 Hayden Rowe Street, Apartment Four, Hopkinton, MA 01740!

FREE goodie bags to all attendees, BBQ food and demonstrations by the NEBBC Soldier Dogs!

At the Yard Sale on both days, we will also be collecting donations for local bully breed rescues!  Food, crates, toys, leashes, dish soap...  They need it all!

Come out and show your support while having fun with your canine :)

Again, please no flexi-leashes for this event.  Volunteers needed to set up, price, sell and especially clean-up!  Does anyone have a pass to the dump?  Thank you all for your support!  Check us out on FB for daily updates: http://www.facebook.com/#!/pages/New-England-Bully-Breed-Club/74020777664.
item.how_to_find_us: Bully Dogs everywhere and our blue and gold balloons!
item.why: To raise money to support the New England Bully Breed Club in its mission to promote responsible ownership, raise awareness and aid local rescue efforts.
item.name: Pet-Themed Yard Sale Fundraiser!
